name: Captain, it's MINE !!!
description:
Hi, this is our 48 hour Game Jam project.

We wanted to create Minesweeper with different play modes. Those "play modes" supposed to change players way to interact with basic "node opening" mechanic.

One "custom" mechanic in our game was planned to let you "be" on the field.

   

Btw. we found one game with almost the same idea implemented :

MUSIC MADE BY: https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/Ge5mKRy1wdaBWkPZ6

3D MADE BY: https://www.instagram.com/hk__972/

2D SPRITES (DIDN"T COME UP IN THE GAME) :  https://snoringowlet.itch.io/

All the creepy shit was made by me

As the base to fix logic bugs were taken this template.
